title: TL;DR LF TOP LANER D4+ FOR OOL TEAM
body:
TL;DR LF TOP LANER D4+ FOR OOL TEAM

Hello Summoners, 

I am the manager of GRV Esports, ‘Loststardust’. I do a lot of things for the team but here are few the main things:

I help make sure the team has scrims and I schedule the team timetable
I speak once a week to the players one on one to talk to them about how their lives are going, if they are having any problems with the team and ask if there is anything I can do for them. 
I help you guys by doing simple analytics
I help with team comps and picks/bans
I will be there 99% of the time for every tournament, scrim and practice session   
I just do my best to support my players the best way I can

Requirements for the player 
Positive attitude 
Willing to learn 
Good quality microphone & internet
Be able to play scrims 5 nights a week + Saturday/Sunday Tournaments 
Use discord (Can teach you how to use it!) 

If this sounds like a good fit for you, please send me a message. We can have a chat on discord and can ask me any questions. We can set up a time for a trial! 

Warm regards, 

~Loststardust, Manager of GRV.
